artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: alarmed looking man seated on a bed, leaning over, with his PR hand in a chamber pot; small smiling figure pulling down on the corner of the bedclothes beneath man; text at top and bottom: "POUR FINJIR ESPANTOS / DIALOGO COMICO / EN UN ACTO. / EDITOR / PROPIETARIO / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Por Fingir Espantos (Frightened by a Ghost), plate 16 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
